For IP Cameras For IPTV

Flussonic features

This is a full list of our product’s features. Make sure to check out what we offer for clients with IP cameras and IPTV sources.

VOD streaming
  • Streaming from MP4 and FLV files
  • RTMP, HLS, HDS, DASH, RTSP delivery
  • Multibitrate and multilanguage MP4 streaming
  • Support for HTTP storages
  • SSD media caching
  • Industry unique cache-aware HLS file delivery
Video recording
  • Automatic DVR cleanup
  • EPG based DVR access
  • Timeshifted restreaming
  • MPEG-TS, HLS, HDS, RTSP, RTMP access to DVR
  • Screenshots of recording
  • DVR exporting
Live streaming
  • Satellite capturing
  • Transcoding
  • IP cameras support
  • Stream thumbnails
  • Republishing between servers
  • MPEG-2 support
Internal statistics collection
  • All protocol sessions accounting (RTMP, MPEG-TS, HLS, HDS)
  • Measuring per-stream traffic
  • Geo-stats and geo-lock
Web UI configuration
  • General monitoring
  • Server call statistics
  • Support
API
  • External HTTP backend authorization
  • Full control over server via HTTP
  • Realtime event feed via HTTP
  • Monitoring HTTP
  • SQL API with access to history
